'''Mike Smith''' is a [[flow arts]] practitioner known for creating '''Fan VTG 1:1''', an adaptation of the [[Vulcan Tech Gospel]] notation system for [[Fan (flow arts)|fans]].<ref name="fan-vtg">{{cite web |url=https://www.instagram.com/p/CBg7tcxAX5N/ |title=Fan VTG 1:1 |author=Mike Smith |via=Instagram}}</ref>

Fan VTG 1:1 adapts the timing and direction framework originally developed for [[poi]] to describe the relationship between two fans held in opposite hands. The system accounts for the unique properties of fans, including their flat profile and the visual significance of which face is showing.
